titleStmt.title: Literæ illustr. Domini Fagel, Hollandiæ pensionarii, ad Dominum Jacobum Steuart, advocatu[m], hoc eodem quo jam prodeunt idiomate exaratæ : in quibus quæ sit Serenissimorum Principum Auriacorum de Testæ Legumque Pœnalium contra pontificios in Britannia lrtarum [sic] abolitione sententia declaratur A letter writ by Mijn Heer Fagel, pensioner of Holland, to Mr. James Stewart, advocate : giving an account of the Prince and Princess of Orange's thoughts concerning the repeal of the Test and the Penal Laws.
Letter writ by Mijn Heer Fagel, pensioner of Holland, to James Stewart, advocate. Latin & English
titleStmt.author: Fagel, Gaspar, 1634-1688.
Stewart, James, Sir, 1635-1713.
